程序包 Model

类 ChatMessage

java.lang.Object
Model.ChatMessage
public class ChatMessage extends Object
Represents a chat message in the Smart Finance Application. This class encapsulates the content of a message, whether it was sent by the user, and the timestamp of when the message was created.
版本:
1.0
作者:
Group 19

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明

    content
    The content of the chat message.
    private final boolean
    isUserSent
    Indicates whether the message was sent by the user.
    private final LocalDateTime
    timestamp
    The timestamp of when the message was created.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ChatMessage

      public ChatMessage(String content, boolean isUserSent, LocalDateTime timestamp)
      Constructs a ChatMessage with the specified content, sender information, and timestamp.
      参数:
      content - The content of the chat message.
      isUserSent - true if the message was sent by the user, false otherwise.
      timestamp - The timestamp of when the message was created.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getContent

      public String getContent()
      Gets the content of the chat message.
      返回:
      The message content.

    • isUserSent

      public boolean isUserSent()
      Checks if the message was sent by the user.
      返回:
      true if the message was sent by the user, false otherwise.

    • getTimestamp

      public LocalDateTime getTimestamp()
      Gets the timestamp of when the message was created.
      返回:
      The message timestamp.
